text: Un décor rustique, des petits plats comme à la maison (c'est bon, c'est confortable, mais ce n'est pas marquant... peut-être à l'exception des côtes levées qui fondent dans la bouche) et un service souriant. L'ambiance est chaleureuse, on s'y sent bien. Les prix sont très abordables autant le midi que le soir. En général, c'est bien.  Pour ceux que ça intéresse, une critique un peu moins objective se retrouve sur mon blog (la boufferie).

Une belle trouvaille! When I'm in town, I never miss the opportunity to have their Salmon Tartare. Amazing! The owner is also a very cool guy who loves his rum. The largest and most exciting selection of rum.  Food is exquisite and very affordable. Perfect for a delicious lunch in the village...

My husband and I visited O'Chalet on a Friday night, our last night in Montreal. Most of the city was still digging out from the record-breaking snow storm the day before so we were the only guests in the restaurant for most of the night. Neither my husband nor I speak very much French, however our waiter patiently translated their menu for us (which was entirely in French). We had very tasty seared scallops for an appetizer while we waited for our meals. My husband had fish with asparagus and the tastiest beet quinoa I've every tried for an entree. I had a beautiful flank steak with gorgonzola polenta and broccolini (our waiter suggested the perfect glass of red wine to go with my meal, as well). For dessert, my husband had a very light and tasty creme brûlée an dI had their warm brownie with raspberry sorbet and chocolate sauce. It was the perfect meal for a cold quiet night in Montreal and we will definitely go back here next time we return!
YUMM!! excellent food and service! delicious, fresh ingredients, what more can one ask for?!! :)

Repas du soir très agréable. Carte courte mais variée, cuisine goûteuse, authentique, de qualité, généreuse. Service courtois et efficace, pro. Belle ambiance relax, thème rustique chic. Vins majorés très raisonnablement (2x).  À mettre sur la liste des endroits à investir en groupe.
